Which is when you notice.

She brought a diaper bag sitting on the bathrooms changing table. You gulped hopping that didn't mean what you thought it did. Sure enough you placed on the changing table and she takes out a baby diaper! You're in shock and cannot say anything. Offering no resistance she easily has you powered and diapered. Looking down at the diaper you are really disappointed in your body for fitting the diaper perfectly. No doubt it would easily hold any mess or wetting you did. "Allison" you finally say quietly.

"I have never been the caretaker for a teen baby before so this will be new for me, thank you for selecting me as your caretaker at this convention though! I am very excited to take care of you little one!"

Wait this woman seems to think you want act like a baby and be taken care of. As if you would have a fetish for that sort of thing. You feel yourself go bright red in embarrassment of the situation she is putting you in.

You bury your face in her chest feeling humiliated.

"Its ok baby. Normally I take care of real babies but I am willing to treat you no different today. I went and bought everything we would need for you today. Lets have some fun I got a surprise for you!"
She starts walking to the door. Everyone at the convention is going to see you!
154232.title: Baby diaper and onese

1542321.content:

"Won't this be fun!?" Asked your caretaker joyously.. "Just remember you can keep all the stuff I bought for you today including that stroller! Now lets get you strapped in!"

Not even noticing if anyone else at the convention is looking at you no sooner find yourself being strapped in. There is a basket area on the stroller as well that seems to be holding a package of the same diapers you are wearing.

"Here is your surprise." Stated the happy caretaker showing you a bottle. " I got for you a special custom formula at a bottle and formula stand." Says the Amazonian woman who seems to be really enjoying this. "It will do something special for you today! Drink up baby!"
You shudder to think what she means by something 'special'. The bottle is forced pushed into your mouth and you hold onto it. She goes up behind the stroller and begins pushing into the convention. "Now what should we look at first? Do you think there are any other teen babies or adult babies here today?"


You both look around and see only real babies and toddlers with their caretakers and parents. There are no teen babies in this convention anywhere in sight. On the bright side though no one seems to be looking at you. Either you are passing as a real toddler right now or people here are just used to seeing teens dressed like this. As she pushes you suddenly realize she is making you drink from a baby bottle. Maybe you should throw it and tell her to stop doing this to you?
